short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds users at checkout that they are on a no buy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The purpose of this chrome extension is to remind users who are on a “no buy”, (meaning that their intention is to not purchase non-critical items until what they already own is consumed) to consume mindfully and reflect on if they really need or want the items that they are thinking of purchasing. 

Stores currently supported:
- SetActive
- Gap
- Sephora
- Ulta
